__TOC__

Report of September 2012

* Members of Ubuntu Greece are participated in events foe Software Freedom Day in towns all over Greece
* Two members of Ubuntu Greece, <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~dgkontopoulos|evolgen]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~christriant|clepto]]</nowiki>, are taken part in Ubuntu App competition. Evolgen's application <nowiki>[[https://apps.ubuntu.com/cat/applications/orthcal|orthcal]]</nowiki> takes the 2rd place and clepto's app <nowiki>[[https://apps.ubuntu.com/cat/applications/mangar|mangar]]</nowiki> the 4th place.
* A countdown banner for 12.10 is created by art team in order to set in the forum of our community http://forum.ubuntu-gr.org/ 

See all team's reports <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GreekTeam/TeamReports|here]]</nowiki>
